description: Added and fixed features on 5 different sites to make the sites more interactive which have been used by 100k+ users daily.
All code was reviewed, perfected, and pushed to production.
Helped to design frontend architecture using React, Redux, React Router and TypeScript.
Added a card-based drag and drop feature to an existing task management system to track task progress.
Created a task issue page to assign tasks to the members.
Implemented an authentication system using JWT which includes access and refresh token to make the site more secure.
Built the frontend part of a payment gateway system to make it possible to do payment from any local digital payment service
Enabled the option to open a bank account from home by developing the frontend part of an online registration system.
